item.title: CVE-2024-29796|2024-03-27T12:26:38.233Z -- Hot Themes -- Hot Random Image
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hot Themes Hot Random Image allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Hot Random Image: from n/a through 1.8.1.
